alert.note: Alert for Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 01 at 2:52PM MST until November 04 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FOR THE EASTERN MOGOLLON RIM, WHITE MOUNTAINS, AND CHUSKA MOUNTAINS FROM 5 AM THURSDAY TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY ABOVE 6500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 6500 feet. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 6500 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Pinetop-Lakeside, Show Low and Window Rock. * WHEN...From 5 AM Thursday to 5 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Snow forecast from 5 AM Thursday to 5 AM Friday: Alpine 1 to 3 inches Buffalo Pass 2 to 4 inches Pinetop-Lkside 3 to 5 inches Show Low 1 to 3 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; White Mountains
